robot Class Reference

Enemy robot class. More...

#include <robots.h>

List of all members.

Public Methods

 robot ()
 Default constructor.

 robot (const robot &in)
 Copy-constructor.

void init ()
 Members initialisation function, is called upon activating the object.

int step (int dt)
 State update function, is called once per frame, moves the robot and fires its gun.

void draw ()
 OpenGL drawing function, is called whenever the engine's camera can see the object, draws the robot.

void draw_shadow ()
 Shadow drawing function.

flyMesh* get_mesh ()
 Returns the object's mesh in a flyMesh object.

int message (const flyVector &p, float rad, int msg, int param, void *data)
 Message receiving function, is used for communication between objects.

int get_custom_param_desc (int i, flyParamDesc *pd)
 Parameter information retrieval function.

flyBspObject* clone ()
 Creates another instance of the object similar to this one.


Public Attributes

flyMesh* objmesh
 the robot's mesh.

float shield
 the robot's shield, i.e. the amount of damage it can take before dying.

float rotvel
 the robot's maximum rotation velocity.

float movevel
 the robot's maximum movement velocity.

float fireangle
 the minimum angle (with the player) in which the robots fires its gun.

float movedist
 the minimum distance the robot keeps from the player.

float explodedist
 the distance within which the robots explodes in presence of the player.

flyArray<gun *> guns
 the robots arsenal, i.e. an array of guns.

sound* snd_travel
 sound carried by the robot when flying around.

int gunrefreshtime
 the robot's gun delay of fire.

explode* e
 explosion thrown by the robot upon dying.

Detailed Description

Enemy robot class.

This class implements an AI-controlled enemy robot for the ship game.

Fly3D Game Engine ver 2.0 - http://www.fly3d.com.br
